title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5014 - Options
content:

State Regulations
§ 5014.1 - Options available to members at retirement-general
§ 5014.2 - Options available to members at retirement-definitions and statutory authorization
§ 5014.3 - Suspension of retirement allowance where option has been elected
§ 5014.4 - Procedure for electing an option
§ 5014.5 - Definitions as used in this Part
§ 5014.6 - Compliance with IRC section 401(a)(9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5014

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 503[5], 504[1], 513, 539; Retirement and Social Security Law, §§447, 514, 610

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
